datasets.name: Stack Overflow
datasets.description: Stack Overflow forum data with questions, answers, comments, votes, and user interactions

datasets.name: RateBeer
datasets.description: Beer and brewery rating platform with user reviews, preferences, and geographic data

datasets.name: Olist E-commerce
datasets.description: Brazilian e-commerce marketplace with orders, products, sellers, and customer reviews

datasets.name: Meetup Events
datasets.description: Event platform data with user attendance, interests, and social connections

datasets.name: Avito Classifieds
datasets.description: Russian classified ads platform with user clicks and ad engagement data

datasets.name: Clinical Trials
datasets.description: Clinical trial data with study outcomes, site performance, and adverse events

datasets.name: Formula 1
datasets.description: Formula 1 racing data with driver performance, race results, and team statistics

datasets.name: Amazon Reviews
datasets.description: Amazon product reviews and user behavior data for churn and lifetime value prediction
